subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: In the cutthroat N.F.L., Wade Phillips and Mike Shula have come to be defined by the number of times they have been sent packing, but they insist their struggles were just part of what got them to the Super Bowl.
snippet: In the cutthroat N.F.L., Wade Phillips and Mike Shula have come to be defined by the number of times they have been sent packing, but they insist their struggles were just part of what got them to the Super Bowl.
